name: Horder Loot Rush
description:
On the endless run from the Carabus, our hero (The Horder of Horders) will need to make sure he organises his loot with no time to stop running. Kill your foes, take their loot and sort out your inventory before you're too encumbered to escape.

Controls:

A - Attack

S - Block

D - Jump

When you jump you will automatically eat your the first food item in your inventory. If you pick up a weapon you can activate it by dragging into the weapons slot on your hotbar. If the weapon in your inventory is better than your current one then it will shine green otherwise it will be red.

Either drag items into the delete section on the bar or double click them to drop them from your inventory. The more items in your inventory the slower you go.
